definition: an eyesight abnormality resulting from the eye's faulty refractive ability, meaning that items in the distance are not seen easily
details:
noun
- an eyesight abnormality resulting from the eye's faulty refractive ability, meaning that items in the distance are not seen easily
= example: an eyesight abnormality resulting from the eye's faulty refractive ability, meaning that items in the distance are not seen easily
= synonyms: shortsightedness
